Description:
Battlefield 4 Ã¢â€žÂ¢ - it defines the genre, full of action thriller, known for its destructible, which has no equal. Based on a powerful and reliable graphics technology Frostbite Ã¢â€žÂ¢ 3, Battlefield 4 offers a dive into the gaming environment, is striking in its realism.
Only in Battlefield you can destroy buildings in which the enemy is hiding. Only in Battlefield you will lead the assault, while on board the combat boats. Battlefield gives you even greater freedom of action and actions, enabling you to use its own advantages and pave the way to victory.
In addition to the standard multiplayer mode, Battlefield 4 has a rich dramatic campaign with interesting characters that begins with the evacuation of American VIP-persons from Shanghai and talks about the future of your team trying to find their way home. This can not be compared to anything else. Immerse yourself in the gorgeous chaos of total war, which is characteristic only for the games in the series Battlefield.
